mapper.select: SELECT dongname, APTNAME, PRICE, dongextent, donglevel, nameprice, url FROM gwangsan WHERE deal='매매' AND DONGNAME=#{dongname} group by dongname, APTNAME, PRICE, dongextent, donglevel, nameprice, url HAVING PRICE <= (SELECT ROUND(AVG(PRICE)) FROM gwangsan WHERE deal='매매' AND DONGNAME=#{dongname})
